summary: 2 YEARS AGO ON OUR WAY TO FL OUR FLY WHEEL CRACKED AND HAD TO BE REPLACED DOWN IN FL. NOW A FEW WEEKS AGO THE FLY WHEEL IS MAKING THE SAME NOISE IT DID 2 YEARS AGO. WE SHOULDNT HAVE TO REPLACE IT EVERY COUPLE YEARS. SO I HAVE NO VEHICLE TO DRIVE AND WE HAVE TO RELY ON USIN MY HUSBANDS TRUCK AND IM 6 MONTHS PREGNANT. I REALLY NEED TO HAVE MY VAN WORKING!
